name: Skool Daze (ZX Spectrum)
description:
One of the Guardian Newspaper's 30 greatest British video games:
http://tinyurl.com/od53h2z

Skool Daze - the game that has everything - excitement, drama, comedy, tragedy, catapults... join our hero on a madcap romp with your favourite characters - the wicked headmaster, the nutty professor, the ancient history master (the history's quite old, tool!) and, not forgetting the swot and the school bully.

WHAT THE PRESS SAID IN THE 1980s

"… the graphics are tremendous… I can't imagine anyone being disappointed with Skool Daze." - 93% (CRASH Magazine, December 1984)


*** This game is also available as part of the Spectaculator, ZX Spectrum Emulator app (as an in-app purchase) ***
